title: How to Make an Iced Green Tea Latte

steps.headline: Mix the green tea powder and water in a cocktail shaker.
steps.description: Stir completely until the powder has dissolved.

steps.headline: Add ice cubes to the cocktail shaker until it's halfway full.
Measure and pour the milk and coffee creamer in.
Place the lid on top of the shaker.
steps.description: Shake well, just like a regular cocktail. You'll know when it's fully blended when there's condensation forming on the outside.

steps.headline: Attach a strainer to the cocktail shaker.
steps.description: Strain the contents in a glass pre-filled with ice cubes.

text: Mix the green tea powder and water in a cocktail shaker. Stir completely until the powder has dissolved. Add ice cubes to the cocktail shaker until it's halfway full.  Measure and pour the milk and coffee creamer in.  Place the lid on top of the shaker. Shake well, just like a regular cocktail. You'll know when it's fully blended when there's condensation forming on the outside. Attach a strainer to the cocktail shaker. Strain the contents in a glass pre-filled with ice cubes.
